pages.title: Welcome to $(#34c9fe)Hololives' continuum$()!
pages.text: $(#34c9fe)HoloContinuum$() adds a variety of Hololive-related items, entities and even biomes to Minecraft.$(br2)This book will guide you through how to get started with this mod! $(br2)Although it works fine without needing to install other mods, $(#008001)JEI$() is highly recommended for the convenience of checking recipes and loot-drops!
